review: This is probably the best technology invention since the smart phone in my opinion!We currently have 3 of them in our house.We use them for Netflix, HBO Go, and more importantly Disney Jr and Disney apps.It's so simple to use even my 3 yr old know how to open  the apps and launch his shows.I also see Google is implementing features where you can control certain things with your remote which will be awesome.I'd never buy a Roku over this. The convenience of using your phone over a remote is great. Plus no box taking up more space. The feature will only increase as well as more and more apps utilize Chromecast.

review: Bought this for a relative for Christmas and decided that I had to have one.  BEWARE! it may cause you to buy another Laptop computer.  The unit works just fine with my phone and tablet but my laptop would not cast to the tv with the Vista platform I was still using.  I soon figured out that I could cast anything on the internet to the TV screen.  I had to upgrade my lap top computer.  Most everything I try to cast through the google chrome browser will cast with the exception that some videos through Amazon and sites like Encore play will not cast through google chrome. They require the Silverlight plugin that is only used by IE.  I have not yet figured out how to overcome this hurdle but I may be able to do it through Firefox. That's my next adventure.
